The floor melted away exposeing the base's remaining fuel in the "gas tank.=
" the fumes rose almost immediately catching fire from the heat from the Ch=
aotican energy. The first fuel tank exploded catching Hellpeon in the middl=
e of it. The blaze started a chain reaction, next the second, then third, w=
ithin moments all five fuel tanks were ablaze along with the entire lower l=
evels of the Trainer base. flames creapt up every line connected, without t=
he computers control of the cut offs there was nothing to control the flame=
s, if they reached the engine and ignited the other power systems there'd b=
e nothing left of the base or anything that remained within fifty miles of =
it.

 large portion of the hallway he was
